original: Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ
analyzed: na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anupādinna

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca

original: naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na aupādinnaḥ ca na anupādinnaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādinnam ca na anupādinnam ca dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
